content: Bomb threat at Capitol Complex averted by quick response. Suspect in custody, minimal disruption.

content: Cyber attack on Defense Data Center thwarted. 'RedCipher' group suspected. No data breach confirmed.

content: Border standoff in Sector 2. Unidentified armed individuals retreated after drone surveillance deploy.
Fugitive apprehended near nuclear research facility. High-level clearance area secured within 30 minutes.
Suspicious drone incursion over coastal military base. Intercepted by navy patrol. Drone recovered intact.
